scripts.release: npm run darwin-x64 && npm run darwin-arm64 && npm run linux-arm64 && npm run linux-x64 && npm run win32-x64 && npm update
scripts.darwin-x64: version=$(cat ./package.json | jq -r '.version') && jq '.optionalDependencies["coredns-dist-darwin-x64"] = "'$version'"' package.json > package.json.tmp && mv package.json.tmp package.json && cd ../darwin-x64 && npm run pre-release
